CommentBody: Missing Icons in Published Reports: There was a bug fix for this in v11.6.0.83+

The customer had an issue to open the Report because EI was the default browser.
I walked the customer through the steps to set Microsoft Edge as the default browser.
The customer had an issue with the Report online because it showed an old date on the Publish Report site.
I reviewed the permission scan and the activity scan. Both failed because they needed the Schema job to run.
I ran the Schema job, and I ran the Permission scan.
I advise the customer to run the Activity scan, and when it's complete, he can run the Report group under 5.Ativity group to update the Report.
We reviewed the Activity group and ensured the Report folder is updated as the job runs.
